name: Custom Claude/Rust Dev Workspace
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y tmux && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && git clone https://github.com/jedarden/claude-usage-monitor-cli /tmp/claude-usage-monitor-cli && cd /tmp/claude-usage-monitor-cli && cargo install --path . && cd /workspaces && git clone https://github.com/ruvnet/claude-flow /tmp/claude-flow && cd /tmp/claude-flow && cargo install --path . && cd /workspaces && npx claude-flow@alpha init --force
